ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.trading

Class TradeOfferComposeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301.t03.trading.TradeOfferComposeController

  • public class TradeOfferComposeController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller portion of the TradeOfferCompose triplet. This will modify the Trade model upon request of the view.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBorrowerItem(Item item)
      add an item to the borrower section of the trade barter.
      void cancelTrade()
      Trigger a cancel trade on the model, this may or may not transition based on the state of the model.
      void offerTrade()
      Trigger an offer on the model, this may or may not transition based on the state of the model.
